title: Curiosity Killed the Copycat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the abilities of other roles while dead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will kill and clean yourself on Night 1.
- While dead, you may use the abilities of any other role that can use that ability while dead (i.e. Medium seance, Phlox, etc.) but you may only use each ability once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Die to see the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 76
*I'd say it had nine lives, but GIM games rarely go past Night 5.*
